snippet: The German chancellor said she supported the efforts the Spanish government was making to right its finances, even as additional measures were being taken to prop up the euro zone’s weaker economies.
abstract: German Chancellor Angela Merkel says she has 'full confidence' in the Spanish government and its efforts to deal with the debt crisis, even as the European Central Bank is taking further steps to help Spain and other struggling euro zone countries.
lead_paragraph: The German chancellor said she supported the efforts the Spanish government was making to right its finances, even as additional measures were being taken to prop up the euro zone’s weaker economies.

headline.seo: Germany’s Merkel Gives Spain Vote of Confidence
headline.main: For Madrid, a Few Encouraging Words From Germany
headline.print_headline: For Madrid, a Few Encouraging Words From Germany
